title: 🚨 Important Announcement - TikTok Ban Updates
description:
ONLY IF THE BAN TAKES PLACE ON JAN 19th 2025 in the USA 1. We would recommend using a VPN and make sure to set it to CANADA to access TikTok and our network until further action is taken. This will allow you to continue using the app. Be sure to share this information with your viewers.

2. Using a VPN bypasses restrictions until the ban is reversed. (TikTok LTD is an American company, albeit owned by ByteDance, a Chinese entity, making a permanent ban unlikely.)

Recommended VPNs: Visit here for a list of top VPNs: https://us.cybernews.com/lp/best-vpn-us/?campaignId=21861415333&adgroupId=178156997668&adId=719283282707&targetId=kwd-501633054912&device=m&gunique=Cj0KCQiAyoi8BhDvARIsAO_CDsCTRn0yX4xo3JfUqEeQbh6Xw4lLD_PvUglN9f0QT4JDZzlF-h0QJbIaAjb4EALw_wcB&gad_source=1&gbraid=0AAAAACyNk23UZQsIPZdUZrB3lB3Jgdfdp&gclid=Cj0KCQiAyoi8BhDvARIsAO_CDsCTRn0yX4xo3JfUqEeQbh6Xw4lLD_PvUglN9f0QT4JDZzlF-h0QJbIaAjb4EALw_wcB.

title: SCOTUS Votes on TikTok Ban set for 1/19/2025 Tomorrow
description: ⏰ The clock is ticking for TikTok, a beloved platform used by millions. On Friday, TikTok will stand before the Supreme Court in a crucial fight against the looming ban unless they sever ties with China. We at Infinitum_US remain hopeful for a positive outcome and stand in support of our community. 💖✨

title: Pray for The west coast
description: 🙏 Let’s unite our hearts and keep everyone on the West Coast in our thoughts as they face devastating fires—our fellow creators, communities, and even TikTok’s LA headquarters are all in need of compassion and support. We’re standing with you in spirit, hoping for safety and relief. ❤️‍🔥✨

title: Important Update: InfiniView/iView Service Downtime
description: Happy New years everyone! We are currently updating and improving InfiniView/iView services to align with TikTok's 2025 policy changes. During this process, analytics services will be temporarily unavailable for a few weeks. Please don’t be alarmed if your stats don’t update during this time. We appreciate your patience and understanding as we work to enhance your experience.

title: THE VAULT IS BACK  Ring in the New Year with Leon & Lion in the TikTok Universe
description:
The Vault officially opens on December 26th @4PM PT and closes on January 2nd @1:59PT for all Top Tier Gifters in the US & CA. Keep reading for more details!
Hey everyone! Are you excited about December's Vault Opening? This opening is extra special as we have special editions of three classic Gifts!
Holiday Leon
Holiday Lion
Holiday Universe
Gifters can click into their LIVE room Gift Panel to check if they can access the Vault and begin unlocking these Legendary Gifts!
Compete in the Vault Challenge & earn profile frames!
The Vault Challenge campaign kicks off alongside this month's Vault opening from December 27th - January 3rd.In this ranking campaign, Creators and Gifters can team up on a Squad Leaderboard to earn exclusive Vault-style profile frames.

Bonus: If you're lucky enough to receive a Vault Gift this month, try creating a highlight video featuring the magical moment with #TheVault to thank your Gifter!

title: December: A Prime Opportunity to Increase Earnings for Infinitum LIVE Creators 💸
description:
During December, U.S. audiences show unique viewing and gifting patterns. While activity briefly dips on Christmas Day, engagement rises before and after the holiday. This creates an ideal window for creators to boost their earnings. Key findings include:
• Steady Creator Participation: Despite the holidays, the number of creators going LIVE remains constant, reflecting a committed creator base.
• Enhanced Generosity: Average Revenue Per Paid User (ARPPU) grows by 5%, as gifters become more generous at year-end.
• Increased Spending: User spending increases by 3% during the pre- and post-Christmas periods.
• Growing Viewership: Viewer numbers rise by 7% outside of the holiday itself, expanding the potential audience.
• Peak ARPPU During Christmas Week: Even though total activity peaks before and after Christmas, ARPPU is highest during the holiday week, allowing creators to earn more from fewer but more valuable gifters.

Advantage for Managed LIVE Creators on our network:
Managed creators excel during this period:
• They attract 8x more viewers per LIVE than non-managed creators, indicating superior content and engagement.
• They achieve a 31% higher watch-to-paid conversion rate, converting more viewers into paying gifters.

By strategically scheduling sessions to match viewer demand, Infinitum LIVE creators can capitalize on these holiday trends. This approach leverages their inherent performance advantages, helping them maximize returns during December’s prime earning season. 🎊❄️

title: Stay calm about the TikTok ban—here's what you need to know 🚨
description:
The ban is not set to take effect until January 19, 2025.
TikTok can still sell and divest from bytedance to stop the ban.
TikTok still has over a month to file an appeal and potentially delay or overturn the decision.
The app will remain available for use; however, starting January 19, 2025, no new downloads or updates will be permitted. (If the ban is not appealed)
With the presidential transition on January 20, 2025, an executive order could potentially reverse the ban. 🔄
